info.title: DESCRIPTION
info.body: BOYSEN®® Oil Tinting Colors are concentrated alkyd-based tinting colors for alkyd-type paints like Quick Drying Enamel. They mix easily and produce tints from pastel to medium shades with even finishes.

info.title: APPLICATION SCHEDULE
info.body: Stir well before using. Close container and clean painting tools immediately with BOYSEN®® Paint Thinner B‑0340.
